easy.q: I have a face and two hands but no arms or legs. I tell you what time it is. What am I?
easy.hint: It tick-tocks and points to numbers.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think about a tiny word that changes when you add letters.

hard.q: Two friends start at opposite ends of a 100-step hallway. Each step, they move one step closer in alternating turns: first A, then B, and so on. Who reaches the middle first if they stop exactly on the middle step? Or can they land on it together?
hard.a: They reach the exact middle step together (or neither reaches it first, depending on 100 steps and turns).
hard.hint: Consider parity and turn order in a fixed-length path.
